channel.title: Showcase :: Documentation for the Alchemist Simulator
channel.description: Examples from published papers Showcase Contents 2020: Optimal resilient distributed data collection in mobile edge environmentsSimulation of crowd control with mobile in Turin. 2022: Dynamic Decentralization Domains for the Internet of ThingsSimulation of collective distributed sensing and acting using Toronto rain gaugeâ€™s data. 2022: Situated recommendation systemSimulation of people attending attractions inside the Mirabilandia amusement park. 2022: Turin's 2017 stampede in simulationSimulation of Piazza San Carlo crowd disaster 2023: MacroSwarm - A Field-based Compositional Framework for Swarm ProgrammingSimulations demonstrating MacroSwarm, a field-based library for expressing swarm behaviors in a declarative way, presented at COORDINATION 2023.
